roleset.name: be, exists ('non-existent' has its own frame, fyi)
roleset.note: EXIST-V NOTES: Based on big corpus; nominal 'existing' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls gorge-39.6, exist-47.1-1. (from exist.01-v)
EXISTENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, exist-v.01. exist-47.1-1 (from existent.01-j)
EXISTING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from existing.01-n)

example.name: existential angst
example.text: ...a case of political corruption that-1 *trace*-1 simply doesn't exist.

example.name: with secondary attribute
example.text: John exists as a figment of my imagination.
example.arg: as a figment of my imagination

example.name: stupid WSJ style guide
example.text: No mechanism *trace*-1 exists [for finding a middle ground]-1 .

example.name: nominal rel: existing
example.text: there must be in the mind at the same instant ideas of its existing in a considerable number of other points of time and place;
example.arg: in a considerable number of other points of time and place

example.name: the arg
example.text: Which rights are ?fundamental? or even existent is entirely subjective.

example.name: non-existent. Relemmatize!
example.text: Even if the human factors involved in global warming are minimal or non-existent, is it such a terrible thing to ask people to pollute a little less?

example.name: both args
example.text: Socrates is existent as a man
